tool.name: OGS: createTetgenSmeshFromRasters
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'createTetgenSmeshFromRasters'.
tool.command: for i in $raster_list; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; for i in $input_mesh_file; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; createTetgenSmeshFromRasters $ascii_output #if str($thickness).strip() != 'None' and str($thickness).strip() != '': --thickness '$thickness' #end if --raster-list '$raster_list.element_identifier' --input-mesh-file '$input_mesh_file.element_identifier' --output-mesh-file output_1.smesh

param.name: ascii_output
param.label: ascii output
param.help: Write VTU output in ASCII format.

param.name: thickness
param.label: thickness
param.help: The minimum thickness of a layer to be integrated at any given location (min = 0)

param.name: raster_list
param.label: raster list
param.help: Input (.vtu). An ascii-file containing a list of raster files, starting from top (DEM) to bottom.

param.name: input_mesh_file
param.label: input mesh file
param.help: Input (.vtu | .msh). The file the 2D input mesh

tool.help: This tool runs the **createTetgenSmeshFromRasters** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
